features.name: Fast Hands
features.description: Use Cunning Action to make Sleight of Hand checks, use thieves' tools, or use an object.

features.name: Second-Story Work
features.description: Climb at full speed; running jump distance increased by DEX modifier.

features.name: Supreme Sneak
features.description: Advantage on Stealth checks if you move no more than half speed.

features.name: Use Magic Device
features.description: Ignore class, race, and level requirements on magic items.

features.name: Thief's Reflexes
features.description: Take two turns on the first round of combat; the second turn happens at initiative −10.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: Proficiency with disguise kit and poisoner's kit.

features.name: Assassinate
features.description: Advantage on attacks against creatures that haven't taken a turn yet; auto-critical on surprised targets.

features.name: Evocation Savant
features.description: Halve the gold and time to copy evocation spells into your spellbook.

features.name: Sculpt Spells
features.description: Create pockets of safety within evocation spells; chosen creatures auto-succeed their saves and take no damage.

features.name: Potent Cantrip
features.description: Creatures that succeed on saves against your damaging cantrips take half damage.

features.name: Empowered Evocation
features.description: Add INT modifier to damage rolls of wizard evocation spells.

features.name: Overchannel
features.description: Deal maximum damage with a wizard spell of 5th level or lower; take necrotic damage on subsequent uses.

features.name: Frenzy
features.description: While raging, bonus action melee weapon attack each turn; exhausted after rage ends.

features.name: Mindless Rage
features.description: Cannot be charmed or frightened while raging; conditions suspend rather than end.

features.name: Intimidating Presence
features.description: Action to frighten one creature within 30 ft (Wisdom save vs DC 8 + proficiency + CHA).

features.name: Retaliation
features.description: Reaction melee attack after taking damage from a creature within 5 ft.

features.name: Life Domain Spells
features.description: Bless, Cure Wounds always prepared.

features.name: Bonus Proficiency
features.description: Proficiency with heavy armor.

features.name: Disciple of Life
features.description: Healing spells restore additional HP equal to 2 + spell level.

features.name: Blessed Healer
features.description: Heal 2 + spell level HP yourself when you cast healing spells on others.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: Once per turn, +1d8 radiant damage (increases to 2d8 at level 14).

features.name: Supreme Healing
features.description: Use maximum dice result instead of rolling for healing spells.

features.name: Improved Critical
features.description: Score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

features.name: Remarkable Athlete
features.description: Add half proficiency (round up) to STR/DEX/CON checks not already proficient; running long jump distance increases by STR modifier.

features.name: Additional Fighting Style
features.description: Choose a second Fighting Style option.

features.name: Superior Critical
features.description: Score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

features.name: Survivor
features.description: Regain HP equal to 5 + CON modifier at the start of your turn if you have fewer than half your maximum HP (but more than 0).

features.name: Open Hand Technique
features.description: After hitting with Flurry of Blows, impose knock prone, push 15 ft, or deny reactions until next turn.

features.name: Wholeness of Body
features.description: Action to restore HP equal to 3× monk level; once per long rest.

features.name: Tranquility
features.description: Sanctuary effect at end of long rest; lasts until next long rest.

features.name: Quivering Palm
features.description: Set vibrations on a hit; spend 3 ki to reduce target to 0 HP (CON save negates, takes 10d10 necrotic instead).

features.name: Sacred Weapon
features.description: Channel Divinity: weapon gains +CHA to attack rolls, sheds light for 1 min.

features.name: Turn the Unholy
features.description: Channel Divinity: undead and fiends flee for 1 min (Wisdom save negates).

features.name: Aura of Devotion
features.description: You and allies within 10 ft (30 ft at level 18) can't be charmed while you're conscious.

features.name: Purity of Spirit
features.description: Always under the effect of Protection from Evil and Good.

features.name: Holy Nimbus
features.description: Action: emanate sunlight; enemies starting turn within 30 ft take 10 radiant damage; advantage on saves vs spells from fiends and undead for 1 hour.

features.name: Hunter's Prey
features.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker.

features.name: Defensive Tactics
features.description: Choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will.

features.name: Multiattack (Hunter)
features.description: Choose Volley (ranged) or Whirlwind Attack (melee).

features.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
features.description: Choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge.

features.name: Dragon Ancestor
features.description: Choose a dragon type; gain its associated damage type and language.

features.name: Draconic Resilience
features.description: HP maximum increases by sorcerer level; AC is 13 + DEX modifier when not armored.

features.name: Elemental Affinity
features.description: Add CHA modifier to damage of ancestor's type; spend 1 sorcery point for resistance to that damage type for 1 hour.

features.name: Dragon Wings
features.description: Bonus action to sprout dragon wings and gain fly speed equal to your speed.

features.name: Draconic Presence
features.description: Spend 5 sorcery points: aura of awe or fear in 60 ft for 1 min (Wisdom save negates).

features.name: Dark One's Blessing
features.description: When you reduce a hostile to 0 HP, gain CHA modifier + warlock level temp HP.

features.name: Expanded Spell List
features.description: Burning Hands, Command, Blindness/Deafness, Scorching Ray always available.

features.name: Dark One's Own Luck
features.description: Add d10 to an ability check or saving throw; usable once per short or long rest.

features.name: Fiendish Resilience
features.description: After short or long rest, choose one damage type to gain resistance to.

features.name: Hurl Through Hell
features.description: After hitting, send creature through lower planes; takes 10d10 psychic damage if not a fiend; once per long rest.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies (Lore)
features.description: Three skill proficiencies of your choice.

features.name: Cutting Words
features.description: Reaction: expend Bardic Inspiration to subtract d6 from a creature's attack, ability check, or damage roll.

features.name: Additional Magical Secrets
features.description: Learn two spells from any class spell list.

features.name: Peerless Skill
features.description: Expend Bardic Inspiration and add the die to your own ability check.

features.name: Combat Wild Shape
features.description: Wild Shape as a bonus action; spend spell slots to regain HP (1d8 per spell level).

features.name: Circle Forms
features.description: Wild Shape into CR 1 beasts (CR = max(1, level/3) at level 2; access to elemental forms at level 10).

features.name: Primal Strike
features.description: Wild Shape attacks count as magical for overcoming resistances.

features.name: Elemental Wild Shape
features.description: Expend two Wild Shape uses to transform into an air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

features.name: Thousand Forms
features.description: Cast Alter Self at will.
